title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the REST API with sync & async generators.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for declarative Ollama installation on NixOS.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats via Ollama with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes and generate text using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Rust, C#, Swift and more.

title: ollama-docker-stack
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open-WebUI, Milvus vector DB and Nginx.

title: ollama-whatsapp
summary: WhatsApp bot leveraging Ollama for on-device LLM responses via Twilio.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
